> "What ever must be done, do it for the glory of the master" hissed Pleased the femme

Marauder nodded, "Good." an enigmatic smile appearing on his face.

He looked back at the other robots that continued to look up at him.
"Insectors" he said, giving them their collective name. "There are
more sparks that lay scattered out on the surface of this planet. I
have given you the coordinates that will allow you to locate their
drop sites. You will retrieve as many as possible and bring them here,
and then you will have more brothers to aid you in the conquering of
this planet."

As one they nod, eager smiles appearing on their faces.

"Venom, you will confer with Dirge, and he will give you any last
minute details, and coordinate your teams."

Venom hissed but then nodded, "Yes commander." He looked over at Dirge
as he walked over and they began speaking.

Marauder turned away to look at Lamia, "Now as for you, there is much
we can do, much in deed." He smiled as he began to lead her away from
the other robots.

As he walked he glanced back at Lamia, "We can improve not only your
skills but your form. Do you wish maintain your snake mode. There are
so many other forms to be had." Marauder gestured grandly as he
talked.

(TAG)

Preston
